ICurveAbstractImp Class Reference

List of all members.

Detailed Description

The GisICurveAbstract class is a curve Geometry type (abstract). GisICurveAbstract is the most general curve type.


Public Member Functions

__property NAMESPACE_GIS_GEOMETRY::IDirectPosition * get_EndPosition ()
 Gets the ending position of this Curve.
__property System::Boolean get_IsClosed ()
 Gets the closure state for the curve.

 Gets the starting position of this Curve.
